mention.text: bernardo jaramillo , president of the left-wing patriotic union
president of the left-wing patriotic union

the only colombian subversive group that refuses to accept the peace proposals formulated by the administration of president virgilio barco and instead has increased its attacks on the country 's petroleum installations to demand the nationalization of that industry
the administration of president virgilio barco
